title: Polycube
summary: A polycube is a solid figure formed by joining one or more equal cubes face to face.   Polycubes are the three-dimensional analogues of the planar polyominoes.  The Soma cube, the Bedlam cube, the Diabolical cube, the Slothouberâ€“Graatsma puzzle, and the Conway puzzle are examples of packing problems based on polycubes.[1]
